title: Personalized Rose Day website for the user's girlfriend

requirements.text: Create a single-page Rose Day website experience dedicated to the user's girlfriend, with romantic copy and a clear Rose Day theme.

quotes: make a website for roseday for MY OWN GIRLFRIEND

acceptanceCriteria: App loads to a Rose Day themed page without requiring login
Page includes a prominent headline (e.g., “Happy Rose Day”) and a short romantic message addressed to the girlfriend
Content is readable and visually polished on both mobile and desktop

requirements.text: Add personalization inputs (client-side) so the user can set: girlfriend name, sender name, and a custom message, and immediately preview the updated page.

quotes: make a website for roseday for MY OWN GIRLFRIEND

acceptanceCriteria: UI provides input fields for girlfriend name, sender name, and a longer message
Preview updates immediately when inputs change
A “Reset to default” action restores the default sample text

requirements.text: Include a small interactive “Rose Day moments” section (client-side) such as 3–6 clickable cards/steps (e.g., Compliment, Memory, Promise) that reveal short messages when clicked.

quotes: make a website for roseday for MY OWN GIRLFRIEND

acceptanceCriteria: There are at least 3 interactive items
Each item toggles/reveals additional text on click/tap
Interactions work with keyboard navigation (tab + enter/space)

requirements.text: Implement a coherent, distinctive romantic visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) and apply it consistently across the site (avoid a default/template look).
acceptanceCriteria: Theme is consistent across sections and components
Theme does not rely on a generic/default blue-purple gradient look
Mobile layout is well-spaced with no overlapping elements

requirements.text: Generate and add custom static images for the site (hero/illustration + small decorative assets) and render them from the frontend as static assets.
acceptanceCriteria: All required generated images are present in frontend/public/assets/generated
Images are referenced directly by the frontend (no backend/image API)
Images display crisply on mobile and desktop and do not cause layout shifts

constraints: Frontend must not modify files under the immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
Backend must follow the single-actor architecture (all Motoko logic in backend/main.mo); only add migration.mo if persistent state upgrades are necessary
Use English for all user-facing text
nonGoals: Internet Identity authentication or user accounts
Sending emails, SMS, push notifications, or any external messaging
Integrations with external databases or third-party services

required: Romantic rose-themed hero illustration with soft warm tones (rose-hero.dim_1600x900.png)
